short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Puts even more rocket fuel into Sifter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ziften is a browser extension for Chrome (and Safari) that puts even more rocket fuel into the issuetracker Sifter. It adds hotkeys, search improvements and more for the best issuetracker for small teams.

This version features:
- Jump to issue from the searchbox
- Jump to project from the searchbox
- "Other" link in the issues menu
- Hotkeys (n for new issue, s for focus on searchbox and more!)
- Mention issues with "#1234"
- One click issuenumber selection
- Async filtering of issues

Check the full featurelist on our site: https://github.com/mac-cain13/ziften#features--what-does-it-do
